about_the_game:
On the night when the crimson star embroidered the black sky, you were born as the primal darkness, the very first blasphemy. Inside a world full of holiness, you possess the power to corrupt light into darkness. Corrupt the divine forces opposing you, and construct your own dominion.

ㅤ

Strategic Combat

'Revelatio' is a turn-based strategy game that combines tile-based combat and elements of roguelike. Strategically summon and control units to claim victory.

ㅤ

Faith

The core of this game lies in the faith system, where enemies can be corrupted and converted into the player's units. Corrupt various units, NPCs and even the final boss of the game, and turn them into your faithful followers.

ㅤ

Stigmata

You can bestow powerful traits called "stigmata" upon units you corrupted. Strategically combine units with different stigmata to build a powerful army.

ㅤ

Various Enemies

Revelatio features a wide variety of uniquely designed enemies. From warriors imbued with the power of the Holy Kingdom to massive bosses towering over the battlefield, eliminate the foes that stand in your way.

ㅤ

Roguelite Elements

After each game, players can choose one unit to register in the Divine Hall. Units in the Divine Hall can be summoned in subsequent games. Additionally, players can unlock new characters with unique skills and new stigmata at the sanctum using souls collected by defeating enemies.
